extension.description:
Complete backup solution for LibreELEC. Backup options include:
• System: config.txt and configuration files • Add-ons: installed add-ons and their user data • Media: sources, playlists, and thumbnails • User Data: profiles, game saves, and skin settings
Features: - Manual backup creation - Custom backup location support - Backup rotation with configurable retention - Easy restore functionality - Progress notifications - Automated scheduling (Coming Soon in future update)
Credits: - Icon by Smashicon @ flaticon.com/4275334 - Fanart: Low Poly Mountain by Design+Code @ wallpaperswide.com/low_poly_mountain_2-wallpapers.html
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2024-03-10) - Initial release - Full backup and restore functionality - Manual backup creation and restoration - Custom backup location support - Backup rotation with configurable retention - Progress notifications - Compatible with LibreELEC 12.0.2 and Kodi 20 (Nexus) Note: Automated scheduling functionality is planned for a future update
